description: Mohave Valley Daily News  added  2 new photos . BULLHEAD MAN MISSING  Bullhead City police are searching for an endangered missing man.  At about 9 p.m. Monday, Richard Allen Pierce 82, left his home in the 2600 block of Via Corona. Police say he suffers from dementia and left without his medication.  ...   Pierce reportedly drove away in a light blue 2003 Mitsubishi Galant bearing Arizona license plate 281HPR. He also took the family dog, a small Dachshund named Pokie, police spokeswoman Emily Fromelt said.   He was last seen wearing brown shorts, a gray tank top, white tennis shoes and a baseball cap with a Ford logo. He has brown eyes and gray hair, stands about 5-foot-10 and weighs about 150 pounds.  Police are actively searching for Pierce, Fromelt said, and are concerned for his welfare.  Anyone with any information about is asked to contact the Bullhead City Police Department at 928-763-1999.  UPDATE: Police now report that Mr. Pierce has been found safely.   See More
